docs.title: Welcome to Dojyo's Research
docs.text: Hi, I'm Dojyo. In this pages, I share my research interest on Physics.

docs.title: Who are you Dojyo?
docs.text: I am a Japanese, living in Tokyo. Dojyo means a kind of Japanese 'Loach' rather than my actual name. But I use this particular noun as me anyway. I enjoy thinking about the certain aspect of quantum mechanics for my spare times. This is what I should say now. Good day ¥(**)/
